author: Melissa Chang
comment: Work great on the first floor of my house (including background). But audio doesn't transmit on the second floor. Also, watcher device beeps right away when it loses WiFi connection. It would be nice if it waited a couple minutes before beeping.

author: Adriene Hadlich
comment: Hard to connect the 2 devices always timing out or having trouble finding one another

author: Thilina Daminda
comment: WORKS WELL, PLEASE UPGRADE FOLLOWING, 1. TO USE WITH DATA WHERE WIFI OUT OF RANGE.  2. NEED TO TALK TO BABY THROUGH APP. 3. TO RECOGNIZE BABY VOICE (IT IS IMPORTANT WHEN BABY SLEEPS IN NOISY ENVIRONMENT, LIKE HOSPITAL WARD)

author: Steve Barrett
comment: Keeps crashing of a WhatsApp message comes in when it is in use

author: Rickard Arvedal
comment: Great app, but should support multiple watcher on one baby

reply.author: The Babywatcher Team
reply.content: Hi! Thanks for your feedback! Multiple watchers are in our upcoming feature list! Will try to fix when there is time! Regards!

author: Hagai Levi
comment: Didn't work at all

author: Linus Hanger
comment: Great app and does everything I need.

author: Tina Spreadborough
comment: Amazing app

author: Laura Korcsok
comment: Works as it expected and quite simple to set up, perfect

author: Kari Huff
comment: Great! Easy to use and convient. Saved us for having to buy a baby monitor too!! I give 4 stars only because sometimes it does disconnect if the baby device received a notification...other then that it's the best monitor app I've tried. We've used it for about 6-8 months now and I don't like any of the others like I do babywatcher! 👍👍👍

author: Dmitri Dudin
comment: Great app! Best of its kind i would say. Easy to use and default settings for sound sensitivity are perfect. I use it  with my  Sony Z5 compact that has broken camera but still can be a sound monitoring device. +++

author: Naomi Smith
comment: Excellent, easy to use, perfect sound quality...I can hear her snoring when I click to listen! It's very responsive too.

author: Peter Loydall
comment: It loses the signal too often to rely on it

author: Perico Alferez
comment: Simple genius

author: Tomi Hukkalainen
comment: When the alarm is triggered it just makes a single beep. If you miss that and the baby keeps crying, you better notice the vibration as that's the only notice you get unless there's a quiet break first. Going back to Dormi.

reply.author: The Babywatcher Team
reply.content: Hi Tomi! I guess you are referring to the "Play alarm sound at BABY event" feature? It is designed to repeat the alarm with a 30 second delay. If that is not the case with your phone we have a bug with it and need to fix it! Please, drop us a mail to info@baby-watcher.com with some info and we'll try to sort it out for you! Merry Christmas!

title: Doesn't make enough noise

author: testifyin
comment: The app is very straightforward and works out of the box.  However, I purchased the separate Video module.  And now all I see is a spinning circle.  No video at all and I paid for it.  Please HELP!

author: David J
comment: Crashes when attempting to navigate to provided ip address on watcher device

reply.author: The Babywatcher Team
reply.content: Hi David! I am sorry to hear about your problem! Did you press "report crash" when you got the crash? Can you mail us additional info about the crash to info@baby-watcher.com so we can fix your problem! Looking forward to fix this for you! Thanks!

comment: Simple and it works well. Will be great if there is a log. Thanks a lot and good job!
title: Works well

author: Ay Esm
comment: Good but notification on Samsung fit2 not working

reply.author: The Babywatcher Team
reply.content: Hi Ay! Thanks for reporting this! Best regards!

title: Good but notification on Samsung fit2 not working

author: Michał Lipiński
comment: Great free of charge nanny app:) works well

author: Jeremy Nadke
comment: Android wear support.  It has intelligent detection and only alerts you if audio exceeds a threshold.  On an alert it streams live audio to you. Easy to dismiss.  Best feature is it will let you know if it gets disconnected.
title: Better than Dormi

comment: App does not work well at all. The comnection is lost more than ir does connect, even with the devices next to each other. App just crashes and closes a lot, so you dont even know its no longer on. Terrible.

reply.author: The Babywatcher Team
reply.content: Hi! We are very sorry to hear about your experiences! Did you disable battery optimization? If not, this might be the reason. Please contact us at info@baby-watcher.com if you have more information regarding any crashes. Thanks for your review! Regards

title: Not good at all

author: Joe Cunningham
comment: Does just what it says. Simple setup, video is a little glitchy to be a paid feature.

author: Cristina Ballester Sierra
comment: Best app ever. Very useful, very handy annd very easy to use.
title: Lucas

author: Z Zzz
comment: Impossible to get reconnected, unless baby monitor (phone) get restarted. Samsung note 5
title: After a while connection drops,

author: ala tmp
comment: it jus doesnt work. does not detect the monitor even though devices lay side by side
title: unreliable

author: Ardian Dermaku
comment: I would gladly give it 5 stars becouse its worth it but the only reason i give it 4 stars is the quality of the sound thats coming is very poor, u can hear just some noise and not the baby sound, mb is just me.

reply.author: The Babywatcher Team
reply.content:
Hi Ardian,

Thanks for your feedback! Please try out the latest version. There has been some bug fixes in the audio encoding.

Thanks for reporting this!

Best regards

title: It's OK

author: MicaiCutie
comment: Even u turn off the baby monitor,  it still transmit sound

reply.author: The Babywatcher Team
reply.content: Thank you for reviewing Babywatcher! The baby monitor will be running in the background to allow you to use the phone for other things. It can easily be accessed from the top menu. To fully quit the app you need to select "Quit" from the menu (3 dots) in the right corner of the app. Hope that takes care of your issue! Best regards!

title: Bug

comment: Just love it.
title: It works, easy to use.

author: hai nguyen
comment: Simply we need

author: Carl Johansson
comment: Amazing UI and feature set
title: Best baby monitor app

author: Andreas Almén
comment: Simple setup and easy to use.
title: It's free and it works

author: Igor Gurovski
comment: Fungerar fint!
title: Bra app

author: Dalibor Dedic
comment: Perfect application...very nice ui and simple to use. ..BIG thanx to developers. ..5 stars from me...
title: Nice and simple

author: Elaine Der
comment: Doesn't support motorola xt910

author: BRIAN maddalon
comment: no video monitor
Great app...video footage is not working

author: Sophia Tan
comment: Simple and effective app.
